title: Transgender Vaishnavi plays an important role in Lawrence Nikki Galrani Motta Siva ketta siva - Tamil Movie News
text: Vikram's 'Dhruva Natchiram' shoot in Chennai Actor Raghava Lawrence's 'Motta Siva Ketta Siva' has been scheduled to hit the screens on February 17, 2017. The remake of Telugu super hit 'Pattas' which and it has been directed by Sai Ramani. This is the 88th production venture of the prestigious Super Good Films banner of RB Choudhary. Tamil Nadu release rights of the film have been purchased by Dr.Sivabalan. Vendhar Movies holds the release rights for rest of the world. The films tars Raghava Lawrence and Nikki Galrani in lead roles. Sathyaraj. Kovai Sarala, Sathish, Manobala. 'Naan Kadavul' Rajendran. VTV Ganesh, Sukanya, Mayilsamy and many others. Apart from these popular actors Vaishnavi a Transgender person has also acted in an important role in this film. It is worth recalling that transgender Priya played an important role in Lawrence's '2011 blockbuster 'Kanchana' and that will directed by Lawrence is one of the first few Tamil films to have portrayed the community in a dignified manner Hot beauty Raai Laxmi has danced to a song with Raghava Lawrence. Speaking about the film, director Sai Ramani said "The film is centered around the ego clash between two police officers played by Lawrence and Sathyaraj. An anti-social element tires to utilize this fight between the cops and gain some benefits. How the cops handle him is the rest of the story." The director assures that 'Motta Siva Ketta Siva' will be an out and out commercial entertainer. Amresh has rendered the music score. Songs have been penned by Vairamuthu. Viveka, Sairamani, Sorko and Loganathan. Sarvesh Murari has cranked the camera while editing is by Praveen KL.
